channel.title: How do I build a suggestion box for work?
channel.description: At my job, we are trying to build a physical suggestion box for those who can't use computers. Does anyone know a good site that can teach me or know of a good way to build it? What type of wood should I use? We want it to be a pretty good size (not too big or small).

item.title: How do I build a suggestion box for work?
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
download phpbb and wamp, configure that shit open port 80 in windows firewall and your router, then bind a dns domain to your IP and give people the address if you have a dynamic IP install no-ip.com

And if you know any people who can’t use a computer, please put them out of their misery.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I build a suggestion box for work?
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
step 1: buy wood
step 2: make box out of wood
step 3: make hole in wood
step 4: you now have a suggestion box

alternatively get a mail box
